casebody.data:
RUST, Plaintiff v. HAUSELT, et al., Defendants.

Before Sedgwick and Sandford, JJ.

Decided February 5, 1877. Motion for leave to amend order of reversal, by inserting a direction for a new trial, agreeably to the decision of the court at general term, the same having been inadvertently omitted. Motion granted upon terms.

Decision per Curiam.
